statements: SELECT * FROM products
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE reorder_threshold < quantity
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE reorder_threshold < 20 LIMIT 5
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE quantity < 50 AND reorder_threshold > 10
SELECT name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM products WHERE inventory_level < reorder_threshold;
SELECT product_id, product_name, inventory_level FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE inventory_level > 50 OR reorder_threshold < 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE inventory_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM products ORDER BY inventory_level DESC;
SELECT product_id, inventory_level, reorder_threshold FROM products WHERE reorder_threshold <= 10;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM reorder_logs WHERE reorder_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE inventory_level > 0;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE inventory_level < 10 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, reorder_level FROM reorder_thresholds WHERE reorder_level < 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, reorder_date FROM products JOIN reorder_logs ON products.product_id = reorder_logs.product_id;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM products WHERE inventory_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, reorder_level FROM products JOIN reorder_thresholds ON products.product_id = reorder_thresholds.product_id;
SELECT * FROM reorder_logs ORDER BY reorder_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products WHERE inventory_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level, reorder_threshold FROM Products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_condition FROM Triggers WHERE trigger_condition IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY inventory_level DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM Products WHERE inventory_level < 50 OR reorder_threshold > 100 ORDER BY reorder_threshold ASC;

SELECT product_id, product_name, inventory_level, reorder_threshold, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM Products JOIN Orders ON Products.product_id = Orders.product_id GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_orders DESC;

SELECT Products.product_id, Products.product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM Products LEFT JOIN TriggerLogs ON Products.product_id = TriggerLogs.trigger_id GROUP BY Products.product_id ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT trigger_name, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM Triggers JOIN TriggerLogs ON Triggers.trigger_id = TriggerLogs.trigger_id GROUP BY trigger_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT id, name FROM Product ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, inventory FROM Product WHERE inventory < 10;
SELECT product_id, new_inventory FROM InventoryLog WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, threshold FROM ReorderTrigger WHERE reorder_quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT name, inventory, threshold FROM Product WHERE inventory > 0;
SELECT id, product_id, new_inventory, timestamp FROM InventoryLog ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_id, reorder_quantity, reorder_timestamp FROM ReorderTrigger WHERE reorder_quantity > 10 ORDER BY reorder_timestamp;
SELECT product_id, threshold, notification_message, notification_timestamp FROM ThresholdNotification WHERE threshold <= 5;
